title: Billionaire tech pioneer Nandan Nilekani takes on Amazon, Walmart in India - The Indian Express
content: Billionaire tech pioneer Nandan Nilekani takes on Amazon, Walmart in India  The Indian Express
description: Now 66, Nandan Nilekani has one more ambitious goal. The high-profile mogul is helping Prime Minister Narendra Modi build an open technology network that seeks to level the playing field for small merchants in the countryâ€™s fragmented but fast-growing $1 trillion retail market.
